title: STAT+: Epic sues health information network over nearly 300,000 illegally accessed records
description: Epic Systems is suing Health Gorilla, a health information network, over improperly accessing nearly 300,000 patient records.
content: Epic Systems is suing Health Gorilla, a health information network, over improperly accessing nearly 300,000 patient records.
